metadata.name: Alien: Genesis
metadata.description:
Alien â€“ Any person not a citizen or national of the country where they are living.

Created during a time of intensified racial injustice, the themes associated with the exploration of this project provoked many questions throughout its development.

As we continue to explore the possibilities of inhabiting our local planets, what will the laws of interplanetary travel, citizenship, and naturalization resemble? Will we continue to create artificial and imagined borders, fighting for resources in neighboring and distant martian territories?
